results.title: Affair in Trinidad
results.brief_description: An American woman working as a dancer in Trinidad with her artist husband (Neil Emery), is gradually drawn into a web of secret police deals and espionage when her husband is found dead, believed murdered. She, the only ‘key’, is used to obtain evidence against his murderers. His brother arrives to be confronted by his brother’s death. Suspicious, he seeks to find out the truth, falling in love with his dead brother’s wife on the way. Cast includes Rita Hayworth, Glenn Ford, Alexander Scourby and Valerie Bettis (who was also responsible for choreographing Rita Hayworth’s dance sequences). Costume designer Jean Louis was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Costume.

results.title: Adventures of Jimmy
results.brief_description: A picturesque account of the search of a particularly naive young man for his ideal mate in the big city (San Francisco) and his rather overwhelming success at the film’s conclusion. Though told with tongue in cheek, it has a lot to say about loneliness in a busy world. Stylistically, “Adventures of Jimmy” takes a not undeserved poke at those psychoanalytical literary travelogues so popular in the 1950’s featuring the neurotic as hero. Mr Broughton reads the commentary while Weldon Kees, himself a poet and painter, arranged and plays the musical accompaniment. Written by James Broughton. Photography by Frank Stauffacher.

results.title: Adventures of Dollie
results.creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
results.brief_description: Kidnapped from her family’s yard by a vengeful gypsy, Dolly is placed in a barrel which travels down a stream and over a waterfall. A young angler fishes the barrel from the river, and the family is reunited. Cast includes Arthur Johnson, Linda Arvidson, Charles Inslee, Madeline West. Silent film with English intertitles.

results.title: Absolute power
results.creator_credit: Clint Eastwood, Karen Spiegel, Malpaso Company and Castle Rock Entertainment
results.brief_description: Absolute Power is a political thriller about a retiring thief who witnesses a murder - by the President of the United States. Fearing that he will be blamed, the thief plans to flee the country - after making amends with his estranged daughter - but decides instead to stay and fight the hypocrisy. Masterfully directed (and starring) Clint Eastwood, this paranoid conspiracy crime story bristles with suspense and features an all impressive cast that includes Gene Hackman, Ed Harris, Laura Linney, Scott Glenn, Dennis Haysbert, E.G. Marshall and Judy Davis.

results.title: Abe Lincoln in Illinois
results.creator_credit: John Cromwell, Max Gordon and RKO Radio Pictures
results.brief_description: Adapted from the Pulitzer Prize-winning play by American author and playwright, Robert E. Sherwood, this film version captures the essence and fervour of one of America’s most memorable periods in its founding history. It takes a biographical slice of time out of Abraham Lincoln’s (Raymond Massey) life beginning with his early adult years as a woodsman, to his courtships first with Ann Rutledge (Mary Howard) and then with Mary Todd (Ruth Gordon), his eventual wife, through to years of law practice and finally to his election as President and the Declaration of Independence. Cast also includes Gene Lockhart, Howard da Silva and Alan Baxter.

results.title: A Streetcar named Desire
results.creator_credit: Elia Kazan and Charles K. Feldman
results.brief_description: Blanche Dubois, a faded Southern belle whose fortunes have crumbled to nothing, comes to New Orleans to stay with her sister, Stella. Stella’s husband, the brutish but magnetic Stanley Kowalski is suspicious of her past and puts in train a devastating chain of events which will finally destroy for all time Blanche’s already tenuous grasp on the world of reality. Stars Vivien Leigh and Marlon Brando. Based on the play by Tennessee Williams. Also stars Karl Malden.

results.title: A Song for Tibet
results.creator_credit: Arcady Films, D L I Productions, ONF | NFB, Anne Henderson, Kent Martin and Abbey Jack Neidik
results.brief_description: Two Tibetans-in-exile, living in Canada tell of their efforts to preserve the culture and religion of Tibet under the occupation. They journey to India to meet the Dali Lama. Narrated by Thubten Samdup and Dicki Chhoyang.

results.title: A Perfect world
results.creator_credit: Clint Eastwood, Mark Johnson and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Eight year old Phillip, the son of a devout Jehovah’s witness mother, is staying home while all other children are out trick-or-treating. The next morning their home is broken into by prison escapee Butch Haynes, who needing a hostage to aid his escape from jail, grabs Phillip and flees. Phillip curiously looks up to Butch and willingly accompanies him as they take to Texas highway on the run from the cops. Butch is not particularly anxious to make it to the Texas border, being more concerned about fulfilling Phillip’s prohibited wants and dreams. Texas Ranger Red Garnett is not in any hurry to catch Butch either. As Butch and Phillip form a father-son relationship, the paths of Butch and Garnett gradually come together in time for a final confrontation. Cast includes Kevin Costner, Clint Eastwood, Laura Dern and T.J. Lowther.

results.title: A Morning Stroll
results.creator_credit: Nic Gill, Grant Orchard, Sue Goffe and Studio AKA
results.brief_description: Why DID the chicken cross the road? This short animation seeks the answer in the past (1959) the present (2009) and the dystopian future of 2059.

results.title: A Burlesque on Carmen
results.creator_credit: Jesse Robbins, Essanay Film Manufacturing Company and Charles Chaplin
results.brief_description: This film was intended by Chaplin to be a two-reel film, but to his annoyance additional material was added after he left Essanay, the Production Company of the film. It is a parody of two contemporary films based on Bizet’s opera, by Cecil B. De Mille (starring Geraldine Ferrar) and Raoul Walsh (starring vamp Theda Bara). Chaplin plays Darn Hosiery (Don Jose), the Corporal of the Guard who is seduced by Carmen (Edna Purviance) so that gypsy smugglers can get their swag through the city gates. His chief rivals for Carmen’s affections are Escamillo, the toreador and a fellow soldier of the guard, Leo White.
